column1: Round Start: Create a An Acquired Taste in hand.
I've Captured 3+ units. When I level up, Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.

"My friend, I know that expression. I can see you feelin' like the cards you're holdin' ain't the ones you deserve. You got a desire for the finer things, don'tcha? Perhaps you'll allow me to satisfy your hunger, let you savor all that you ever desired. All I need is your name, scratched on my paper... and you, my friend, will be satisfied for life."
